data.name: Razortron 2000 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Razortron 2000 Soundtrack is a collection of 10 awesome tracks from 5 different artists, and you can get it completely free if you bought the game!

All tracks are on MP3 format

Ambient Teknology - Snoodle
DJ Cary - Call me Snake
Love Amplifier - Creative Destruction
Love Amplifier - Fi Love
SGX - Burnout
SGX - Activity Unbroken
SGX - Span
SGX - Synesthetic(ft Russ Anderson)
SkinMechanix - Dimentsion Jump
SkinMechanix - Ultravista
